credit_line: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
title: Design for Three Monograms: E. V. B.
medium: In pen and black, red, green, and brown ink; brush and black ink; red, green and brown watercolor on cream illustration board.
description: At upper left, monogram comprised of two addorsed figure-eights forming an "E" and "B" above a small "V"; to the right, a monogram comprised of an "E" in the form of a rectangle with a circular central branch next to a black rectangle containing a white "V", next to a "B" formed by a figure-eight of concentric circles. Below, a monogram comprised of a "B/E" above two "V"s.
name: Drawing
